Uses of Interface
com.stormpath.spring.security.authz.permission.Permission

  • Packages that use Permission 
    Package Description
    com.stormpath.spring.security.authz.permission  
    com.stormpath.spring.security.provider  

    • Uses of Permission in com.stormpath.spring.security.authz.permission

      Classes in com.stormpath.spring.security.authz.permission that implement Permission 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DomainPermission
      Provides a base Permission class from which type-safe/domain-specific subclasses may extend.
      class  WildcardPermission
      A WildcardPermission is a very flexible permission construct supporting multiple levels of permission matching.
      Methods in com.stormpath.spring.security.authz.permission with parameters of type Permission 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean WildcardPermission.implies(Permission p)
      Only supports comparisons with other WildcardPermissions.
      boolean Permission.implies(Permission p)
      Returns true if this current instance implies all the functionality and/or resource access described by the specified Permission argument, false otherwise.

    • Uses of Permission in com.stormpath.spring.security.provider

      Methods in com.stormpath.spring.security.provider that return Permission 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Permission WildcardPermissionResolver.resolvePermission(String permissionString)
      Returns a new WildcardPermission instance constructed based on the specified permissionString.
      Permission PermissionResolver.resolvePermission(String permissionString)
      Resolves a Permission based on the given String representation.
      Methods in com.stormpath.spring.security.provider that return types with arguments of type Permission 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Set<Permission> CustomDataPermissionResolver.getPermissions(CustomData customData)
      Returns a set of Permission instances stored in the specified CustomData resource.
      Set<Permission> AccountPermissionResolver.resolvePermissions(Account account)
      Returns a set of Permissions assigned to a particular Stormpath Account.
      Set<Permission> AccountCustomDataPermissionResolver.resolvePermissions(Account account) 
      Set<Permission> GroupCustomDataPermissionResolver.resolvePermissions(Group group) 
      Set<Permission> GroupPermissionResolver.resolvePermissions(Group group)
      Returns a set of Permissions assigned to a particular Stormpath Group.
